mapper.sql: f_cid, f_cid as f_cid_0 ,f_cid as f_cid_1 ,f_uid ,f_coupon_name, f_coupon_fee, f_use_rule, f_use_time, f_deadline, f_desc ,f_get_time, f_category, f_status
mapper.select:
(select
from t_coupons where f_uid = #{uid} and f_status = 0 and f_category < 2 and f_use_rule <= #{smoney} ) UNION ( SELECT c.f_cid, c.f_cid AS f_cid_0, c.f_cid AS f_cid_1, c.f_uid, f_coupon_name, f_coupon_fee, f_use_rule, f_use_time, f_deadline, f_desc, f_get_time, f_category, f_status from t_coupons c LEFT JOIN t_site_coupons_record s ON c.f_cid = s.f_cid where c.f_uid = #{uid} and c.f_status = 0 and c.f_category = 2 and c.f_use_rule <= #{smoney} and s.f_site_id = #{siteId} )
